review_title: Decent place to work but very demanding
job_title: Registered Early Childhood Educator in Orleans, ON
pros: - only things i can think of is the children
cons:
- not paid enough for the amount of work you do
- makes you feel like everything you do is not good enough and management focus alot on the negative. 
- dont have enough assistance when dealing with difficult situations
- no recognition for the work you do

job_title: After School Counselor in Ottawa, ON
pros: Depending on the school and management, it can be a great time! I personally had a great experience working with my team. The community you can build with coworkers, supervisors, families and school staff is very rewarding!
cons:
Depending on the school and management, you may be stuck with senior supervisors who made management errors and refused to take responsibility for their actions. Getting a great supervisor can be very hit-and-miss.

Given the nature of the work and age demographic of the employees, upward-mobility for someone entering the company is very restricted.
